name: mega-cuff
effect: Unused. This appears as the boy player’s Mega Bracelet in Pokémon Contests, but it cannot actually be obtained.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This bracelet contains an untold power that somehow enables Pokémon carrying a Mega Stone to Mega Evolve in battle.
